employment.name: Employment Contract
employment.description: Contract of employment between employer and employee

clauses.name: Parties
clauses.sampleText: This agreement is entered into between [EMPLOYER] ("the Employer") and [EMPLOYEE] ("the Employee").

clauses.name: Commencement Date
clauses.sampleText: The Employee's employment shall commence on [DATE].

clauses.name: Job Description & Duties
clauses.sampleText: The Employee is employed in the position of [POSITION] and shall perform the duties set out in Annexure A.

clauses.name: Remuneration
clauses.sampleText: The Employee shall receive a monthly salary of R[AMOUNT], payable on the last working day of each month.

clauses.name: Working Hours
clauses.sampleText: The Employee's normal working hours shall be [X] hours per week, from [TIME] to [TIME], Monday to Friday.

clauses.name: Leave Entitlement
clauses.description: Annual, sick, and family responsibility leave
clauses.sampleText: The Employee shall be entitled to [X] days annual leave per annum in accordance with the Basic Conditions of Employment Act.

clauses.name: Probation Period
clauses.sampleText: The Employee shall serve a probationary period of [X] months from the commencement date.

clauses.name: Termination
clauses.sampleText: Either party may terminate this agreement by giving [X] weeks' written notice.

clauses.name: Confidentiality
clauses.sampleText: The Employee shall not disclose any confidential information of the Employer during or after employment.

clauses.name: Restraint of Trade
clauses.sampleText: For a period of [X] months after termination, the Employee shall not engage in competing business within [AREA].

clauses.name: Deductions
clauses.sampleText: The Employer may deduct from the Employee's remuneration amounts authorized by law or agreed in writing.

clauses.name: Dispute Resolution
clauses.sampleText: Any dispute arising from this agreement shall be referred to the CCMA for conciliation and, if necessary, arbitration.

clauses.name: Parties
clauses.sampleText: This lease is entered into between [LANDLORD] ("the Landlord") and [TENANT] ("the Tenant").

clauses.name: Description of Premises
clauses.sampleText: The Landlord hereby lets to the Tenant the property situated at [ADDRESS] ("the Premises").

clauses.name: Lease Term
clauses.sampleText: The lease shall commence on [DATE] and terminate on [DATE], a period of [X] months.

clauses.name: Rental Amount
clauses.sampleText: The Tenant shall pay a monthly rental of R[AMOUNT], due on the first day of each month.

clauses.name: Deposit
clauses.sampleText: The Tenant shall pay a deposit of R[AMOUNT] which shall be held in an interest-bearing account in accordance with the Rental Housing Act.

clauses.name: Rental Escalation
clauses.sampleText: The rental shall escalate by [X]% on each anniversary of the commencement date.

clauses.name: Maintenance & Repairs
clauses.sampleText: The Tenant shall maintain the Premises in good condition and shall be responsible for minor repairs up to R[AMOUNT].

clauses.name: Utilities
clauses.sampleText: The Tenant shall be responsible for payment of electricity, water, and other utilities consumed at the Premises.

clauses.name: Use of Premises
clauses.sampleText: The Premises shall be used solely for residential purposes and not for any business or commercial activity.

clauses.name: Subletting
clauses.sampleText: The Tenant shall not sublet the Premises or any part thereof without the prior written consent of the Landlord.

clauses.name: Termination
clauses.sampleText: Either party may terminate this lease by giving [X] months' written notice.

clauses.name: Inspection
clauses.sampleText: A joint inspection shall be conducted at commencement and termination of the lease.

clauses.name: Parties
clauses.sampleText: This agreement is entered into between [PROVIDER] ("the Service Provider") and [CLIENT] ("the Client").

clauses.name: Scope of Services
clauses.description: Description of services to be provided
clauses.sampleText: The Service Provider shall provide the services described in Schedule A ("the Services").

clauses.name: Fees and Payment
clauses.sampleText: The Client shall pay the Service Provider fees as set out in Schedule B, within [X] days of invoice.

clauses.name: Term
clauses.sampleText: This agreement shall commence on [DATE] and continue for a period of [X] months.

clauses.name: Termination
clauses.sampleText: Either party may terminate this agreement by giving [X] days' written notice.

clauses.name: Warranties
clauses.sampleText: The Service Provider warrants that the Services shall be performed with reasonable skill and care.

clauses.name: Limitation of Liability
clauses.sampleText: The Service Provider's total liability shall not exceed the fees paid under this agreement.

clauses.name: Indemnity
clauses.sampleText: Each party shall indemnify the other against claims arising from its breach of this agreement.

clauses.name: Confidentiality
clauses.sampleText: Each party shall keep confidential all information received from the other party.

clauses.name: Intellectual Property
clauses.sampleText: All intellectual property created in performing the Services shall vest in [PARTY].

clauses.name: Force Majeure
clauses.sampleText: Neither party shall be liable for failure to perform due to circumstances beyond its reasonable control.

clauses.name: Dispute Resolution
clauses.sampleText: Any dispute shall first be referred to mediation before either party may institute legal proceedings.

clauses.name: Governing Law
clauses.sampleText: This agreement shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of South Africa.

clauses.name: Parties
clauses.sampleText: This agreement is entered into between [DISCLOSER] ("Disclosing Party") and [RECIPIENT] ("Receiving Party").

clauses.name: Definition of Confidential Information
clauses.sampleText: "Confidential Information" means all information disclosed by the Disclosing Party, whether oral, written, or electronic.

clauses.name: Confidentiality Obligations
clauses.sampleText: The Receiving Party shall not disclose Confidential Information to any third party without prior written consent.

clauses.name: Exceptions
clauses.sampleText: Confidential Information does not include information that is publicly available or independently developed.

clauses.name: Term
clauses.sampleText: The obligations under this agreement shall continue for [X] years from the date of disclosure.

clauses.name: Return of Information
clauses.sampleText: Upon request, the Receiving Party shall return or destroy all Confidential Information.

clauses.name: Remedies
clauses.sampleText: The Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief for any breach of this agreement.
